name: Merge Malls 2
description:
Welcome to Merge Malls 2 world! Have you ever dreamed to be a business tycoon and eventually own the whole malls kingdom by diligence? Here Merge Malls 2 helps you achieve your entire wish!

Merge Malls 2 is a relaxing and interesting game for you. In this game you can expand your territories by merging. You can instantly explore new forms and make the upgrades - unlock new modes, new levels, and merge new buildings to create truly legendary realms of your own!

How to play?
-- Merge the same building to make it a new and larger mall, and clear the space meanwhile
-- The bigger the building is, the more coins you will gain.
-- Use the coins you earned to purchase more buildings in the store. Merge and upgrade to earn more MONEY.
-- Attention! Mysterious boxes drops down from time to time. Open them and get more lucky gifts!
-- Tips! Tap the box of the bottom repeatedly and quickly to make the your malls box drop faster and faster.

So are you ready to challenge and be the business tycoon? Merge, build and grow. Start the interesting journey now!
